title: Table of foot-in-the-door sales data - application

content.description:
Elijah and Ayush are both salespeople at a large technology company. Elijah attempts to get as many clients as he can by offering a 30-day trial period for a discounted rate and then asking clients to commit to a yearlong contract. Ayush attempts to gain clients by artificially raising the prices and then offering a discount. Elijah’s and Ayush’s quarterly sales are presented in the table.
